docs.title: 1.1 Build a Team
docs.text:
Choose three characters as a team

  1. When the game starts, each player will get 5 random character cards to choose from.
  2. Each player chooses 3 out of 5 characters to compose a team.
  3. show the characters chosen by each player

docs.title: 1.2 Winning Condition
docs.text: When every character in enemy team is out, you win.

docs.title: 2 The Process of a turn
docs.text:
In one round, each player has a turn to take actions.

Players decide their move turn by turn. In one turn, a player will go through 4 phases:

  • preparation phase
  • resuppliment phase
  • action phase
  • ending phase

docs.title: 3 Properties of a Character
docs.text:
1. image
  2. name
  3. talent
  4. life point
  5. general attack
    1. attack power
    2. attack range
  6. skill
    1. passive/active
    2. skill cost
    3. description

docs.title: 4.1 Talent
docs.text:
Talent can be considered as an extra skill of the character. Talent includes:

  1. Sharpening
  2. Precision
  3. Toughness
  4. Aiding
  5. Agility

docs.title: 4.2 Negative Status
docs.text:
Negative status can be exerted to a character by another character

  1. Freezed
  2. Disarmed
  3. Silenced
  4. Irritated
  5. Dizzy
  6. Grounded
  7. Weakened

docs.title: 4.3 Skill types
docs.text:
• passive skill: triggered automatically when the conditions are fulfilled.
  • active skill: can be invoked during action phase

docs.title: 4.4 Attack Distance
docs.text:
3 kind:

  • 1
  • 2
  • \(+\infty\)

docs.title: Skill
docs.text: Each character possesses a unique skill, which can be either active or passive.

docs.title: Round
docs.text: A round consists of one complete cycle of gameplay. For example, if there are three players, a round ends after all three players have taken their turns in sequence.

docs.title: Talent
docs.text:
Talent can be considered as an extra skill of the character. Talent includes:

  1. Sharpening
  2. Precision
  3. Toughness
  4. Aiding
  5. Agility

docs.title: Turn
docs.text: A turn is the phase during a round when a single player performs their actions. For instance, in a three-player game, each player takes their turn one by one to carry out their moves or decisions.

docs.title: Agility
docs.text: There's a 33% possibility that she/he can move for another step in ending phase.

docs.title: Aiding
docs.text: teammates beside will recover 2 life point every 2 turns.

docs.title: Blood Thirst 血渴
docs.text: Attack all enemies within range 2 and recover life points equal to the damage dealt.

docs.title: Butterfly's Dream 今夜梦蝶
docs.text:
• active skill
  • skill cost: 3
  • description: Once per round, acquire a talent you don't currently possess.

docs.title: Crazy Giant 疯狂巨人
docs.text: Pull enemies within distance 3 to your side, deal 1 attack, and Ground them for 1 round.

docs.title: Disarmed
docs.text: target cannot invoke general attack

docs.title: Dizzy
docs.text: target cannot do anything

docs.title: Faithful Guardian 沉默守卫
docs.text: Designate a teammate to cancel all damage to them until your next action phase.

docs.title: Freezed
docs.text: target cannot move

docs.title: Golden Arrow 百步穿杨
docs.text: 1/3 chance to double damage on general attack.

docs.title: Grounded
docs.text: the maximum distance that target can move is discreased by 1 point.

docs.title: Healer's Heart 医者仁心
docs.text: When using your talent, life points given to teammates are increased to 4.

docs.title: Irritated
docs.text: target can only attack the one who caused this status to them.

docs.title: Journey of a Knight 侠客行
docs.text: Cancel negative status on a character and turn it into a general attack.

docs.title: Kill Scapegoat 祸水东引
docs.text: When about to face a deadly attack, deal 4 damage to another character and escape the incoming damage if the target dies.

docs.title: Last Gift 临行礼物
docs.text: Deals 0-2 random damage to enemies within distance of 1 at the end of the turn.

docs.title: Lightning Strike 闪电一击
docs.text: Move to any vacant hex and invoke a general attack to all enemies in range.

docs.title: Medusa's Eyes 美杜莎之眼
docs.text: Reduces enemy action points by 2 for the next round after being hit by your attack.

docs.title: Melody 劲爆琵琶
docs.text: Designate up to 3 characters to increase or decrease life by 2 points simultaneously.

docs.title: Poisonous Cure 蜜糖砒霜
docs.text: After being attacked, designate a character to recover 2 life points but become Dizzy for 1 round (cannot designate the same target consecutively).

docs.title: Precision
docs.text: ignore the passive skills and the talent of Toughness of the target character

docs.title: Queen's Pride 女王所傲
docs.text: Cause a general attack to all enemies in attack range.

docs.title: Sharpening
docs.text: after 4 attacks, increase the attack hurt by 1 point.

docs.title: Silenced
docs.text: target cannot use attacking skills

docs.title: Thor's Hammer 雷神之锤
docs.text: Ground enemies that are attacked by you more than twice in 1 round for the next round.

docs.title: Toughness
docs.text: When attacked, if the attack hurt is greater than 3, then make it 3.

docs.title: Undefeatable Tongue 舌战群儒
docs.text: Enemies attacked consecutively more than twice in 1 round become Irritated and Silenced for 1 round.

docs.title: Weakened
docs.text: the attack hurt of target is deceased by 1 point

docs.title: Action phase
docs.text: This is the main part of a turn. Player should allocate action points to characters to acquire benefits. There's 3 actions you can use on your characters, consuming different amount of points. - move 1 point - make a character move to an adjoint vacant hexo - attack 2 points - general attack an enemy within your attack distance. - skill x points - to invoke an active skill of the character's - // During this phase, the number of the movement one character take must not exceed 4, while that of the attack must not exceed 3.

docs.title: Active skill
docs.text: can be invoked during Action Phase

docs.title: Attack power
docs.text: a property for every character

docs.title: Attack range
docs.text: a property of a character, defining the maximum distance of an enemy to them that they are able to use general attack on.

docs.title: Ending phase
docs.text:
Some skills of several specific characters might be triggered during this phase.

After this phase, it should be the turn of next player. The game lasts until one of the players win.

docs.title: General attack
docs.text: the attack power of a character is to describe how much damage they are causing to their target

docs.title: Hexo
docs.text:
basic unit of a map, whose status includes:

  • vacant
  • disabled
  • occupied(by)
    • character
    • item

docs.title: Life point
docs.text: how many life value that a character have

docs.title: Passive skill
docs.text: triggered automatically when the conditions are fulfilled.

docs.title: Preparation phase
docs.text: Some skills of several specific characters might be triggered during this phase.

docs.title: Resuppliment phase
docs.text: Player get a number in [2,12]

docs.title: Skill cost
docs.text: property of an active skill, how many points it takes to invoke this skill.
